game.name: Spin Rush
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Spin Rush is 2D arcade game, where you have to collect dots and match colors.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Spin Rush is 2D arcade game, where you have to collect dots and match colors.

reviewHighlights.text: The rules are simple, but that simplicity is what makes it addictive.
firstly, 30$ is WAY too much for this game secondly, the physics of the game are kinda broken, sometimes you land in a situation where the gameplay is...
